thread.title: Bad Lip Reading Of Trump’s Inauguration Is Both Delightful And Possibly Realistic
thread.title_full: Bad Lip Reading Of Trump’s Inauguration Is Both Delightful And Possibly Realistic

author: Smitty
title: Bad Lip Reading Of Trump’s Inauguration Is Both Delightful And Possibly Realistic
text:
Bad Lip Reading Of Trump’s Inauguration Is Both Delightful And Possibly Realistic Smitty | Email 
Haduken to your face. Not too shabby of an effort, per usual of the Bad Lip readings. Obviously Trump isn’t really saying most of those things, but you can definitely see him doing so. As with the others. Especially Hilary channelling her inner batshit. Could’ve gotten a couple shots of Slick Willy in his hormonal charm. You don’t need to see his lips move to know what he’s thinking. 
Pussy. He’s thinking about pussy. 
The above lip reading is suitable, but Ted Cruz’s was spot on and psychotic. It would’ve been funny if it wasn’t actually what he was saying. The Magoo is making a comeback by burying Deadspin, but still, you can’t cure crazy. Smitty |
